title: Dark Harvest
info: The Dark Harvest is a Hardmode whip dropped by the Pumpking during the Pumpkin Moon event. Like other whips, it causes minions to focus on the last-struck enemy.
stat:
Type
Weapon
Damage100 (Summon)
Knockback3 (Very weak)
Use time30 (Average)
Velocity12 (effective)
TooltipYour summons will focus struck enemies
Strike enemies with dark energy to gain attack speed
Dark energy jumps from enemies hit by summons
Rarity08*
Sell10
Research1 required
